page.title: 09Watford: Family Life
page.content:
A typical day would go like this:
A child would get up at about 7.00 to get ready for school. School starts at 9.00 and finishes usually about 3.30 or 4.00. At school you either take a packed lunch, a school dinner or go home for dinner. At home you have a snack and a drink and then you do homework. After dinner you usually go out and play with friends.
Meanwhile parents would be sitting reading the newspaper or watching television. Most parents go to work in the day for more money. Men used to work in the{printing}or{brewery} business.
